query: Query: Why was I placed in the prone position on 11-27-2020 during a medical procedure?
resource_summaries:
A procedure was completed on a patient where they were placed in a prone position at Mount Auburn Hospital on November 22, 2020, due to hypoxemia.
The patient underwent a procedure where they were placed in a prone position at Mount Auburn Hospital on November 30, 2020, due to hypoxemia.
A procedure was completed on a patient where they were placed in a prone position at Mount Auburn Hospital due to hypoxemia on November 27, 2020, between 5:05 PM and 5:20 PM.
answer: Based on your medical record, you were placed in a prone position on November 27, 2020, during a medical procedure.
